text: Shortly after Sega's AM2 division released Daytona USA, the AM3 team were also busy and came out with Sega Rally Championship. Two gaming greats, but I have to give the nod to this game. It's also funny how Takenobu Mitsuyoshi composed the music for Daytona and sang classics like Let's go Away or Sky High, then Tetsuya Mizuguchi & Naoki Takao came out with this theme. I'm sure there was a fun rivalry between the Sega divisions.
